title: Lesson 49
paragraph: This lesson (Lesson 49) continues describing people: intelligence, creativity and friendliness among common traits.

words.meaning: quick to understand, learn, or devise
words.example: She is clever and solves problems quickly.
He felt confident before the interview.

words.meaning: using imagination to produce original ideas
words.example: The team proposed a creative solution.

words.meaning: willfully causing pain or suffering to others
words.example: It was cruel to tease the puppy.

words.meaning: eager to know or learn something
words.example: The child was curious about the insects.

words.meaning: having or showing a lot of energy
words.example: She is energetic and always on the move.
He told a funny story at lunch.

words.meaning: willing to give more of something than is necessary
words.example: She was generous with her time and helped everyone.

words.meaning: kind, mild, or soft in manner
words.example: The doctor has a gentle manner with patients.

words.meaning: putting a lot of effort into work
words.example: She is hard-working and always completes tasks on time.
He is honest and returns lost items.
